title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2526.5 - Confidentiality of information
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2526.5 - Confidentiality of information

State Regulations

The DHCR shall safeguard the confidentiality of
information furnished to it at the request of the person furnishing such
information, unless such information must be made public or available to a
governmental agency in the interest of establishing a record for the future
guidance of persons subject to the RSL. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
2526.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
